# Code of Conduct

While not affiliated with the [Python Software Foundation (PSF)](https://www.python.org/psf-landing/), this project adheres to the [PSF Code of Conduct](https://policies.python.org/python.org/code-of-conduct/), which means that everyone who participates in this project is expected to be **open, considerate, respectful, and welcoming**.

## Reporting Incidents

If you experience or witness unacceptable behavior, please report it by email to [Steven van de Graaf](mailto:steven@vandegraaf.xyz). All reports will be handled with discretion.
